title: Making The Case For Mid-Tier MSOs
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Jon DeCourcey, formerly of Canaccord now with Viridian Capital Advisors, also publishes his analysis on Seeking Alpha. We discuss recent cannabis earnings and why he favors mid-tier multi-state operators (MSOs) over the Big 5. SAFE Banking expectations, how he sees valuations growing. Why retail investors should be excited for stalled cannabis legislation. Uplisting catalyst is misunderstood. Why Ayr Wellness is one of our top picks and some seriously actionable investment advice. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
